WEATHER FORECAST FOR 25 NOVEMBER 2023
Issued at 12.00 noon on 24 November 2023
Showers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in Sabaragamuwa, Central and Western
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts after 2.00 p.m.
A few showers may occur in Northern province and in Trincomalee district.

he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages
caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
